### Category in drawer 
 - **Recently Created** stores internal files you created via this app. 

 - **Recently Viewed** stores external files you imported from other apps. 

 - **Starred** stores those files you have starred as important. 

 - **Archived** temporally stores files you have removed. 
 ### Appearance 
 Allows you to set app color and markdown text theme according to your favour. 
 ### Advanced 
 Allows you to configure advanced options. 
 - **Save Backup** will automatically save a copy of the text in private directory of app if enabled. You will need this if you do not hope to choose a directory on your own and you want to export your text or share it with others. 

 **Warning:** Backup will be lost if the app is uninstalled. 
 ### About 
 Basic introductions about this app and the author.
